description: Gets the credentials of an environment in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this environment and its credentials exist.

parameters.name: environmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the environment whose credentials this operation gets.

nested_items.name: accessKeyId
nested_items.description: The access key ID of the environment.

nested_items.name: expiration
nested_items.description: The expiration timestamp of the environment credentials.

nested_items.name: secretAccessKey
nested_items.description: The secret access key of the environment credentials.

nested_items.name: sessionToken
nested_items.description: The session token of the environment credentials.
